business_problems.name: Declining Repeat Purchase Rates
business_problems.description: Customers are buying less frequently or not returning, which may indicate retention issues.
business_problems.impact: Revenue loss and lower customer lifetime value.
decisions: Which customers or segments to retain or target with loyalty programs.
assumptions: Customers with shorter delivery times have higher repeat purchase probability.

business_problems.name: High Return Rates in Specific Categories
business_problems.description: Certain product categories have excessive return rates affecting profitability.
business_problems.impact: Margin erosion and increased logistics costs.
decisions: Which product categories to phase out or improve quality controls for.
assumptions: Discount-heavy behavior may correlate with higher return rates.

business_problems.name: Regional Differences in Sales Performance
business_problems.description: Strong sales disparities across countries or regions without clear causal factors.
business_problems.impact: Missed revenue opportunities or inefficiencies in marketing spend.
decisions: How to adjust marketing budgets or product assortment by region.
assumptions: Certain product categories perform better in specific countries.

data: Customers with at least one purchase

kpi_definitions.name: Conversion Rate
kpi_definitions.description: Percentage of customers or visits that result in purchases.
kpi_definitions.formula: (Number of purchases / number of unique customers or visits) * 100%
kpi_definitions.tableau_usage: Used to monitor sales effectiveness and website performance.

kpi_definitions.name: Customer Lifetime Value (LTV, simplified)
kpi_definitions.description: Expected revenue from a customer over their entire relationship.
kpi_definitions.formula: Average order value * purchase frequency * customer lifespan
kpi_definitions.tableau_usage: Segment customers by value to allocate marketing resources.

kpi_definitions.name: Return Rate
kpi_definitions.description: Proportion of units returned versus units sold.
kpi_definitions.tableau_usage: Monitor product quality and customer satisfaction by category.

kpi_definitions.name: Average Order Value (AOV)
kpi_definitions.formula: Total revenue / total number of orders

kpi_definitions.name: Customer Retention Rate
kpi_definitions.description: Percentage of customers retained over a period.
kpi_definitions.tableau_usage: Evaluate effectiveness of customer loyalty initiatives.

features: Behavior (recency, frequency, monetary value, discount usage)
